Text: The GARP Virtual ConventionVince I am delighted to inform you that the garponline Convention is now online The response that I have received thus far has been very positive Please feel free to visit the site at wwwgarpcomonline Can I also suggest that you go to the Debate Forum and maybe post some comments address some questions maybe even post questions yourself The web site is onlinediscussionforumasp I trust that you find the Virtual event as exciting and innovative as GARP would like it to be especially given that this is a new avenue for GARP I look forward to your contribution Kind regards Andreas Andreas Simou GARP Conference Director Tel Fax Dont miss the GARP Credit Counterparty Risk Summit program details via our web site wwwgarpcom
